mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity (name, route_id, time, max_people, creator_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{routeId}, #{time}, #{maxPeople}, #{creatorId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, route_id, time, max_people, creator_id FROM activity WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, name, route_id, time, max_people, creator_id FROM activity ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, name, route_id, time, max_people, creator_id FROM activity WHERE creator_id = #{creatorId} ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE activity SET name = #{name}, route_id = #{routeId}, time = #{time}, max_people = #{maxPeople} WHERE id = #{id}
